text: Ormont-Dessous is a municipality in the Aigle district in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the municipality of Ormont-Dessous * Website of La Forclaz * * * Burgenwelt: Château d'Aigremont * Aerial view of Le Sépey * Aerial view of La Forclaz Category:Municipalities in Aigle
